Love the game--there's just something timeless about Portal that never takes away the enjoyment of the game.

Did get stuck on the last part of test 15--I believe it is?--with the timing thing of the two button presses...but, that's why you keep playign cause eventually you get it right? :)

Complex enough puzzles to keep everyone good enough at FPS games to keep playing.

7/10

All you do is go around in a facility lookin' for some cake. To do so, you gotta spawn portals to hell that transport you through hell and to another portal to the normal world. Oh, so that's why it's called Portal!

How can I recommend this game enough?  One of the best games ever made.  I've gotten to the point where I can basically play through the entire thing in my head.  This game was really the reason I got Steam in the first place.  Just buy it, and you won't regret it.

Absolutely outstanding video game! I've 100%ed this game and beat it at leat 10 times and I still fell compeled to play again. The game is indeed easy, but to those who are turned off by that, the challenges in the game are worth your time. This is a game for everyone.
